Name: Stela of Nefer-yu and Sa-menkhet
Description: Rectangular stela with rounded top. Representations and texts are carved with the representations containing some inner detail in relief. The decorated part is surrounded by a simple carved line. The front surface was highly polished, the sides slightly less so and still show chisel marks. The back of the stela was left half-finished. Simple lines are used to separate the inscriptions and the registers.
